author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
For almost a year and a half, we've only had one Grand Theft Auto 6 trailer to to analyze, scrutinize, and hypothesize over, and according to publisher Take-Two Interactive, that's not changing anytime soon. CEO Strauss Zelnick confirmed to Bloomberg that the company isn't ready to share more marketing materials until closer to the game's release date, which also hasn't been revealed. Speaking of release dates, Ghost of Yōtei doesn't have one just yet, but more details of the game's plot have been revealed. And finally, the mythical Nintendo DS port of Halo wasn't axed by Microsoft as many believed. According to a developer who worked on it, the game was actually canned by Nintendo.
title: GTA 6 Trailer 2 Update From Take-Two CEO - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest ARK: Survival Ascended trailer to see the Deinotherium creature in action (created by popular modder Garuga123) and a new ARK The Animated Series pack, featuring a lineup of creatures and characters, ensuring Survivors have a full set of skins based on the ARK: The Animated Series. The Deinotherium is available now for free in the base game for ARK: Survival Ascended on PC, Xbox, and PlayStation. The ARK: Animated Series 109-Costumes Pack is available to download now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Windows PC, and Steam.

Towering over even the largest mammoths, Deinotherium is ready to dominate the open plains. Agitate one, and you may find yourself on the receiving end of a devastating charge—but the real danger lies in their ability to rally their allies with powerful, morale-boosting calls, making a single confrontation quickly escalate into an all-out stampede. Better have a game plan!
title: ARK: Survival Ascended - Official Deinotherium & Animated Series Pack Trailer

author: IGN
title: Unlock the FREE Venom twerk emote on April 1st via Galacta's Cosmic Adventure in Marvel Rivals!

author: IGN
description:
In this clip from the action film G20, President Sutton (Viola Davis) has an intense verbal exchange with Anthony Starr's big bad. 
When the G20 summit comes under siege, U.S. President Danielle Sutton (Academy Award winner Viola Davis) becomes the number one target. After evading capture by the attackers, she must outsmart the enemy to protect her family, defend her country and safeguard world leaders in this action-packed thrill ride. G20 will be streaming globally on Prime Video on April 10.
title: G20 - Official Serve My Country Clip (2025) Viola Davis, Anthony Starr

author: IGN
title: RuneScape: Dragonwilds is a new cooperative open-world survival game! #runescape #gaming #teaser

author: IGN
description:
A small, relaxing, incremental game about restoring a barren wasteland into a lush meadow. Help the magical wolf Lyca run through the land, gather resources, and unlock a vast upgrade tree.
Lyca will be available on Steam April 7, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Lyca - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
It is time to Unleash Your Inner Clash. Watch the latest Clash of Clans trailer to see the WWE collaboration as WWE superstars arrive in the strategy game for an in and out-of-game event throughout April 2025. WWE Superstars will be available in Clash of Clans beginning April 1, 2025, in addition to WWE-themed features appearing in the game, like themed environments, gameplay events, cosmetics, and Easter Eggs paying homage to WWE’s legacy. 

Undisputed WWE Champion Cody Rhodes, Rhea Ripley, The Undertaker, Bianca Belair and other WWE Superstars will be reimagined as iconic characters inside the world of Clash of Clans, culminating in an enhanced match sponsorship at WrestleMania 41 at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas.

Cody Rhodes will be reimagined in the game as "Barbarian King," Rhea Ripley as “Archer Queen,” The Undertaker as “Grand Warden, ”Bianca Belair as “Royal Champion,” Rey Mysterio as “Minion Prince,” Kane as “P.E.K.K.A,” Becky Lynch as “Valkyrie," and Jey Uso as “Thrower.”
title: Clash of Clans x WWE - Official Live Action Trailer (ft. Cody Rhodes)

author: IGN
description:
IGN Live is back for 2025! The in-person event will take place June 7-8 at the Magic Box @ The Reef in downtown Los Angeles. Attendees can expect celebrity interviews, trailers and gameplay reveals, panels, giveaways, hands-on demos, and much more. Tickets are on sale now at ign.com/live!

#IGN #Gaming
title: IGN Live Returns to LA June 7-8, Tickets on Sale Now

author: IGN
description: inZOI is available now in Early Access on Steam. Check out the inZOI launch trailer for this life simulation game. inZOI is a life simulation game where players step into the role of creators, shaping the world as they envision and witnessing the various stories that unfold.
title: inZOI - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Schedule I is available now in Early Access on PC via Steam. Watch the Schedule I launch trailer for this action simulation game. From small-time dope pusher to kingpin - manufacture and distribute a range of drugs throughout the grungy city of Hyland Point. Expand your empire with properties, businesses, employees, and more.
title: Schedule I - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Frendo the clown makes sure this bench press becomes his last rep. Watch the brutal Clown in a Cornfield clip from this upcoming horror film based on the novel by Adam Cesare. Clown in a Cornfield stars Katie Douglas, Aaron Abrams, Carson MacCormac, Vincent Muller, Kevin Durand, and Will Sasso.

Quinn and her father have just moved to the quiet town of Kettle Springs hoping for a fresh start. Instead, she discovers a fractured community that has fallen on hard times after the treasured Baypen Corn Syrup Factory burned down. As the locals bicker amongst themselves and tensions boil over, a sinister, grinning figure emerges from the cornfields to cleanse the town of its burdens, one bloody victim at a time. Welcome to Kettle Springs. The real fun starts when Frendo the clown comes out to play.

Clown in a Cornfield is written by Carter Blanchard and Eli Craig.

Clown in a Cornfield, directed by Eli Craig, opens in US theaters on May 9, 2025.

#ClownInACornfield #Movies #Horror
title: Clown in a Cornfield - Official Clip (2025) Katie Douglas, Carson MacCormac, Aaron Abrams

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at gameplay and learn more about Kiborg in this latest brutal trailer for the upcoming action rogue-lite game. Kiborg will be available on PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC via Steam on April 30, 2025.

Morgan Lee has been accused of war crimes he didn’t commit and sentenced to a 1,300-year sentence on the galaxy’s worst prison planet with no hope of parole. Death provides no escape, as his jailors will keep reviving him until he serves every last second. But one way out does exist: win on Cable Galactica’s hottest game show, “The Last Ticket.”

#Kiborg #Gaming #IGN
title: Kiborg - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tour the beautiful world of RuneScape: Dragonwilds in this teaser trailer for the upcoming all-new open-world survival crafting game powered by Unreal Engine 5. RuneScape: Dragonwilds is set in the beloved RuneScape franchise. On RuneScape’s forgotten continent of Ashenfall, dragons have awoken. Gather, build, skill, and craft to survive in this co-operative survival crafting game. Only by mastering survival and uncovering ancient secrets can you hope to slay the Dragon Queen—alone or with allies. RuneScape: Dragonwilds launches into Early Access on PC in Spring 2025. You can wishlist it now on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1374490/RuneScape_Dragonwilds/

#IGN #Gaming
title: RuneScape: Dragonwilds - Official World Teaser Trailer

description:

author: IGN
description:
Watch our Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar preview! Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar is an adorable return to form for the long-running farming series. While the changes and minor additions don’t particularly innovate on the original, Grand Bazaar is a faithful remake that turns the cuteness up to 11. Just like in Harvest Moon: Grand Bazaar, you’re a newbie farmer who somehow also becomes the hustling heart of Zephyr Town’s hyper-local economy. Check out our Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar hands-on with a PC build, exploring this familiar, and yet whole new game.

#StoryOfSeasons #Gaming #IGN
title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar - The First Preview

author: IGN
description:
Meet the characters of Palworld: More Than Just Pals in this trailer for this Palworld dating sim visual novel game. What lies inside the mysterious World Tree? An exciting school life filled with cute Pals! Will you remain friends or fall in love? Or dismantle and eat them. Your dream school romance starts here. Palworld: More Than Just Pals will be available on Steam (PC).

#Palworld #Gaming #Games
title: Palworld: More Than Just Pals - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Doom: The Dark Ages feels like id Software's answer to shooters like Halo and Call of Duty. From piloting a Doom The Dark Ages mech, to dedicated Doom The Dark Ages dragon-riding levels reminiscent of taking on Covenant scarab tanks in Halo 3 as Master Chief, Doom: The Dark Ages gameplay feels like id Software's answer to the cancelled ideas of Doom 4 and Halo, as well as CoD. Will the introduction of long and elaborate cutscenes in Doom The Dark Ages, as well as vehicle sections, interrupt Doom's intense gameplay flow? Only time will tell.

#DoomTheDarkAges #Doom #Gaming
title: Doom Is Having Its Halo Moment With The Dark Ages

author: IGN
description: Doom: The Dark Ages game director Hugo Martin and executive producer Marty Stratton sit down with IGN's Ryan McCaffrey to discuss the future of Doom after the upcoming prequel along with multiplayer's place in Doom's future, their favorite weapons in the modern series, and more!
title: Doom: The Dark Ages Developers Discuss the Future of Doom

author: IGN
description: When I went into my hands-on with Doom: The Dark Ages I was prepared for intense violence and high volume heavy metal, but what I didn’t count on was such an exhilarating amount of demon-killing variety. By the end of my two-hour demo I’d used a saw-toothed shield to slice through demons like it was Beelzebub’s Beyblade, stomped around a war-ravaged city as a colossal Mecha-Slayer, and even brought a snarling Cyberdemon to an explosive end by breathing fire directly down its throat with my faithful dragon steed. Talk about a heartwarming moment. Every aspect of it looked and felt incredible. It may take place in the dark ages of the Doom timeline, but the Slayer’s latest slaughterfest might well represent the peak of the series’s modern era. Previewed by Tristan Ogilvie.
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - We've Played It!
